channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Flight carrying 242 people bound for London has crashed in Ahmedabad, India
item.description: An Air India flight with 242 passengers and crew that was bound for London crashed in India's northwestern city of Ahmedabad shortly after departure.

item.title: Public polling on Trump's immigration policies. And, preparing your home for flooding
item.description: NPR analyzes the public opinion polling on Trump's immigration policies. And, ways to protect your home from flooding this 2025 hurricane season.

item.title: London-bound Air India flight with more than 240 aboard crashes in Ahmedabad, India
item.description: A Boeing 787 crashed into a residential area in Ahmedabad city five minutes after taking off. The flight was bound for London's Gatwick Airport. There...

item.title: Supreme Court says family can sue over wrong-house raid
item.description: A unanimous Supreme Court said a family whose house was wrongly raided by law enforcement can sue.

item.title: Unanimous Supreme Court makes it easier to sue schools in disability cases
item.description: Chief Justice John Roberts wrote the unanimous opinion, with Justice Clarence Thomas, joined by Justice Brett Kavanaugh, and Justice Sonia Sotomayor, ...

item.title: Maps and photos show how the Los Angeles ICE protests unfolded
item.description: Here is what happened on each day the protests against immigration detention operations in the Los Angeles area.

item.title: 6/12: CBS Morning News
item.description: Air India flight to London crashes after takeoff; NYC ends broker fees for renters.

item.title: Six Gaza aid boat activists deported from Israel
item.description: Their boat had been intercepted as they attempted to break Israel's naval blockade on Gaza and deliver a symbolic amount of aid.

item.title: Anti-ICE protests enter 7th day in L.A., Texas governor deploys National Guard
item.description: Protests against immigration raids entered the seventh day in Los Angeles after another night of curfew enforcement in the downtown neighborhood. Mean...

item.title: Dozens of LA-area mayors demand the Trump administration stop intensified immigration raids

item.description: Three Democratic governors are defending their responses to the migrant crisis​ and dispute claims of failing to cooperate with federal authorities, a...

item.title: What we know so far after Air India flight to London crashes in Ahmedabad
item.description: More than 200 people were on board the flight to London Gatwick when it crashed shortly after take-off.

item.title: Standoff with troops in Los Angeles reignites old feud as Newsom resists Trump’s immigration raids
item.description: An escalating clash pits a Republican president looking to fulfill his mass deportation goals against a Democratic governor with White House aspiratio...

item.title: British passenger in seat 11A survives India plane crash, reports say
item.description: The London-bound Air India plane carrying 242 people crashed shortly after take-off in western India.

item.title: Watchdog finds Iran failing to meet nuclear obligations for first time in 20 years
item.description: Iran condemns the resolution passed by the IAEA's board of governors as "political" and says it will open a new uranium enrichment facility.

item.title: Pope names Chinese bishop as he keeps historic Vatican-Beijing accord
item.description: The 2018 accord sought to resolve the issue of who has authority to appoint bishops.

item.title: Nile Rodgers reflects on Songwriters Hall of Fame, new inductees
item.description: Nile Rodgers, chairman of the Songwriters Hall of Fame, spoke to "CBS Mornings" ahead of the 2025 induction tonight in New York City.

item.title: What to know about the protests over Trump’s immigration crackdown in LA and other cities
